1111.content:
You wake up in bed and immediately notice something's wrong. Your seems bigger; that's not possible. You're smaller. You look down and take off your now much oversized pyjamas to see your body.

It's tiny, it's fat, it's yellow. You scream and it comes out more high-pitched than you planned

"PI-KA-CHUUU"

What you said was so bad I'm not going to translate but you fall out of bed and hurt your tail. What do you do?
1111.title: Normal Pikachu tf

1553321.content:
So which fetish would you like?

Expansion: larger boobs, butt, or others
Inflation: expansion, but with water or air
those are the only 13+ fetishes...

155332222211.content:
You carry a package into the living room and put it on the table. You sit down on the couch and open it up.

Inside the package was a comically sized bottle of pills. You had bought it off the internet after seeing an ad on you favorite ensign. You don't know what compelled you to buy it, or even why you clicked on the sad in the first place. It was called "Burobu Mass Supplements" you assume it was something that helps you row muscle.

You shrug. What's the worst that can happen? If anything it was probably just a placebo...hey, maybe it would turn you into a Pokemon! You chuckle to yourself at that. No, this was probably just a scam from a bankrupt company, that was happening a lot these days. You unscrew the bottle and lance to swallow one of the huge pills.

"Huh...tastes like cherries." You say aloud.

You rub your stomach, and notice that you were hungry all of the sudden. "Huh? But I just ate?" Your stomach begs to differ, giving off an annoyed growl. However, the more you try not to think about food, the more and more you were starving. Before you know what your doing, you walk into the kitchen, and open the fridge, looking for something to eat.

"...need...food" you moan. The rational part of your brain was asking why you were so hungry, but you find that voice becoming more and more distant. You grab out a carton of milk and start to pour it into a glass. A thought escapes about how you should just drink it from the bottle but you snake it off. Somethings not right about you today. With a normal speed you drink the whole of the glasses contents with barley a few gulps.

"Why...am I still..so hungry?" You bought that milk with the sheer intention of not having to be hungry, it even says it will fill you up in one cup on the label. Not really thinking anymore, you now really DO drink the milk from the carton. You start to lose focus of evreything else besides eating. You start to think about how the rules you made before for yourself sound silly now. No second helpings, no dessert, not eating meat, they all lost importance to you. ".Why should I keep myself thin if all j want to do is get fat?" You ask to noons. You put your hand over your moth. Did you seriously just say that?!

Wait your hand feels funny...
155332222211.title: Tf and weight gain

15533222222.content: Adorbs and awkward sluggy coming up!
15533222222.title: Why not goodra?

info.brief_description: Well, the title pretty much says it all- This is open to everyone who is into this stuff
info.description: Well, I'm starting this off with a few stories I'm randomly coming up with- transformation based, of course. The only ones confirmed right now are pikachu and charmander, (my faves), but I encourage everyone else who likes this stuff too to add on- go ahead, pick your favorite pokemon. Just try to make your submissions at least 7 lines long, ok?
